017package org.microbean.invoke;
018
019import java.util.function.Supplier;
020
021import org.microbean.development.annotation.OverridingEncouraged;
022
023/**
024 * A {@link Supplier} that may be <em>deterministic</em>.
025 *
026 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
027 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
028 *
029 * @see #deterministic()
030 */
031@FunctionalInterface
032public interface DeterministicSupplier<T> extends Supplier<T> {
033
034  /**
035   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link
036   * DeterministicSupplier} is <em>deterministic</em>.
037   *
038   * <p>A {@link DeterministicSupplier} is deterministic if and only
039   * if:</p>
040   *
041   * <ul>
042   *
043   * <li>Any two invocations of the {@link #get() get()} method return
044   * objects that are indistinguishable from one another, or</li>
045   *
046   * <li>Any two invocations of the {@link #get() get()} method throw
047   * {@link RuntimeException}s that are indistinguishable from one
048   * another</li>
049   *
050   * </ul>
051   *
052   * <p>The default implementation of this method returns {@code
053   * false}.</p>
054   *
055   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link
056   * DeterministicSupplier} is <em>deterministic</em>
057   *
058   * @idempotency This method and its overrides must be idempotent and
059   * deterministic.
060   *
061   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
062   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
063   *
064   * @see #get()
065   */
066  @OverridingEncouraged
067  public default boolean deterministic() {
068    return false;
069  }
070
071}
